/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.title: home-assistant helm release
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.name: home-assistant
/hr/lkmgr.github.io-charts-app-template-.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn

0:
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN
  valueFrom:
    secretKeyRef:
      name: keycloak
      key: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
  valueFrom:
    secretKeyRef:
      name: keycloak
      key: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
- name: JAVA_OPTS_APPEND
  value: >-
    -XX:+UseContainerSupport
    -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=50.0
    -Djava.awt.headless=true
    -Djgroups.dns.query={{ include "keycloak.fullname" . }}-headless

dn: ${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
dc: tinfoilforest
o: Tinfoilforest
objectclass: top
objectclass: dcObject
objectclass: organization

dn: ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: people

dn: ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: groups

dn: cn=ben,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
gidNumber: 8742
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ben,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
givenName: Ben
sn: ben
uid: ben
uidNumber: 8742
gidNumber: 8742
homeDirectory: /home/ben
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: "${SECRET_ADMIN_EMAIL}"
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x
